column4: does anyone know if ubuntu spins down the hard drives by default?
theres some settings to enable/disable it.
I know there is the setting in System>Preferences>Power Management, however I am curious if that has any effect if I am not logged in
my external usb hd's all spin down ive noticed. never really noticed the internals. (too quiet)
Usually there is nobody logged into the box as its mainly used as a file server
